name: FT Product Research & Design Team Values Workshop Templates
description:
Financial Times Research and Design Values Workshop


What is a values workshop?


A collaborative and enjoyable way to find and use values to help your team work better together. 


How does it work?


Use the first workshop template to help explore individual values.


Then use the second workshop template to bring those values together to create unified team values


Credits to co-creators

Ajai Freeman-Lampard
